caption.center: SOON JA CHOI, Petitioner/Petitioner-Appellant v. STATE OF HAWAI'I,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CIV. NO. 1SD 06-1-0004).
opinion.attorneys: Dwight C.H. Lum, on the application for petitioner/petitioner-appellant.

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: ACOBA, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Levinson, Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: The Application for Writ of Certiorari filed on November 17, 2008 by Petitioner/Petitioner-Appellant Soon Ja Choi is hereby rejected.
